title: The Biggest Scandal in Modern Times (Ep 1412)
description:
The Biggest Scandal in Modern Times (Ep 1412) 


How bad is it going to get with the China story?


Facebook “fact-checker” fact-checks a critique of itself. 

The Greenwald piece about the Hunter Biden criminal probe confirms our worst fears about the media.

Fakebook “fact-checker” relied on China to suppress free speech. 

The tech tyrants at YouTube double-down on censorship. 


Goya triggers AOC into the Phantom Zone.
